antichess
Class PieceTypeFactory

java.lang.Object
  antichess.PieceTypeFactory

public class PieceTypeFactory
extends Object

PieceTypeFactory contains static methods for generating singleton instances of PieceTypes for every type of Chess piece.

public static PieceType getNamedType(String name)
Returns:
